example.text: The EPA’s unnecessary red tape will cause our already strained supply chains to crumble and slash good-paying American jobs. [[url]]
That means that all of the decisions do not flow from 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue. By virtue of the fact that we have a divided government, the people's House is supposed to weigh in on these decisions.
When Biden failed to take action at our border, [[user]] stepped up and passed HR 2, the Secure the Border Act. America's security matters and [[user]] is making it a top priority! [[url]]
In fact, the Democrats could not take that risk, Mr. Speaker. It would be a highly embarrassing spectacle exposing their woke, ESG agenda as toxic to the American public.
The EPA’s unnecessary red tape will cause our already strained supply chains to crumble and slash good-paying American jobs. [[url]]

Today we commemorate Jerusalem Day, marking the unification of Jerusalem under Israeli sovereignty following the Six-Day War in 1967. As a steadfast friend and ally, the United States takes pride in its strong bond with Israel. [[url]]
